type.name: org.gradle.jvm.application.scripts.JavaAppStartScriptGenerationDetails
type.description: * Details for generating Java-based application start scripts.

method.name: getAppNameSystemProperty
method.description: * This system property to use to pass the script name to the application. May be null.

method.name: getApplicationName
method.description: * The display name of the application

method.name: getClasspath
method.description: * The classpath, relative to the application home directory.

method.name: getExitEnvironmentVar
method.description: * The environment variable to use to control exit value (windows only)

method.name: getOptsEnvironmentVar
method.description: * The environment variable to use to provide additional options to the JVM

method.name: getScriptRelPath
method.description: * The path of the script, relative to the application home directory.

property.name: appNameSystemProperty
property.description: * This system property to use to pass the script name to the application. May be null.

property.name: applicationName
property.description: * The display name of the application

property.name: classpath
property.description: * The classpath, relative to the application home directory.

property.name: exitEnvironmentVar
property.description: * The environment variable to use to control exit value (windows only)

property.name: optsEnvironmentVar
property.description: * The environment variable to use to provide additional options to the JVM

property.name: scriptRelPath
property.description: * The path of the script, relative to the application home directory.
